title: Decouple Python video ingest from Node-based ffmpeg resolver fallback
scope: Remove the Python ingest path dependency on calling Node tooling to resolve ffmpeg/ffprobe paths.
Support explicit configuration for ffmpeg/ffprobe paths via environment variables.
acceptance: Video ingest resolves ffmpeg/ffprobe from PATH or explicit env vars and fails with actionable guidance if missing.
No Node subprocess is invoked from the Python ingest code path.

deliverables.title: Python-only ffmpeg/ffprobe resolution
acceptance: Code path uses PATH/env vars only (no node call).
evidence: Unit tests cover missing-file and missing-tool messaging invariants.

subtasks.title: Add env overrides and remove node fallback resolver call.
done_when: No node tooling is invoked from ingest._require_tool.
Env override behavior is implemented and documented via error messages.
